```py
import pandas as pd
import pylab
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

data = pd.read_csv("file.csv")
X = data.X.values
y = data.y.values

plt.scatter(X, y)
plt.xlabel('X')
plt.ylabel('y')
plt.show()
```

```py
degree = 1
model=pylab.polyfit(X,y,degree)
y_pred=pylab.polyval(model,X)
#calculating R-squared value
R2 = 1 - ((y-y_pred)**2).sum()/((y-y.mean())**2).sum()
```
